mapper.insert: insert into job_tasks_field( job_task_id, job_tasks_table_id, source_table_name, source_table_field, target_table_name, target_table_field, sort_order ) values ( #{jobTaskId}, #{jobTasksTableId}, #{sourceTableName}, #{sourceTableField}, #{targetTableName}, #{targetTableField}, #{sortOrder} )

insert into job_tasks_field( job_task_id, job_tasks_table_id, source_table_name, source_table_field, target_table_name, target_table_field, sort_order ) values
( #{fields.jobTaskId}, #{fields.jobTasksTableId}, #{fields.sourceTableName}, #{fields.sourceTableField}, #{fields.targetTableName}, #{fields.targetTableField}, #{fields.sortOrder} )
mapper.update: update job_tasks_field set job_task_id = #{jobTasksField.jobTaskId}, job_tasks_table_id = #{jobTasksField.jobTasksTableId}, source_table_name = #{jobTasksField.sourceTableName}, source_table_field = #{jobTasksField.sourceTableField}, target_table_name = #{jobTasksField.targetTableName}, target_table_field = #{jobTasksField.targetTableField}, sort_order = #{jobTasksField.sortOrder} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, job_task_id AS jobTaskId, job_tasks_table_id AS jobTasksTableId, source_table_name AS sourceTableName, source_table_field AS sourceTableField, target_table_name AS targetTableName, target_table_field AS targetTableField from job_tasks_field where job_task_id = #{jobTaskId} and job_tasks_table_id = #{jobTasksTableId} ORDER BY id

select id, job_task_id AS jobTaskId, job_tasks_table_id AS jobTasksTableId, source_table_name AS sourceTableName, source_table_field AS sourceTableField, target_table_name AS targetTableName, target_table_field AS targetTableField, sort_order AS sortOrder from job_tasks_field where id = #{id}

select id, job_task_id AS jobTaskId, job_tasks_table_id AS jobTasksTableId, source_table_name AS sourceTableName, source_table_field AS sourceTableField, target_table_name AS targetTableName, target_table_field AS targetTableField, sort_order AS sortOrder from job_tasks_field where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
